description: Tags are rewards received for skipping Small Blind or Big Blind. Some trigger immediately, others wait for specific conditions.

tags.effect_en: The next shop will have a free Uncommon Joker
tags.effect_zh: 下一個商店會有免費的罕見小丑牌

tags.effect_en: The next shop will have a free Rare Joker
tags.effect_zh: 下一個商店會有免費的稀有小丑牌

tags.effect_en: The next base edition Joker you find in a Shop becomes Negative (+1 joker slot) and free
tags.effect_zh: 下一個在商店找到的基礎版本小丑牌變成負片版（+1 小丑欄位）且免費

tags.effect_en: The next base edition Joker you find in a Shop becomes Foil (+50 Chips) and free
tags.effect_zh: 下一個在商店找到的基礎版本小丑牌變成閃卡版（+50 籌碼）且免費

tags.effect_en: The next base edition Joker you find in a Shop becomes Holographic (+10 Mult) and free
tags.effect_zh: 下一個在商店找到的基礎版本小丑牌變成全息版（+10 倍率）且免費

tags.effect_en: The next base edition Joker you find in a Shop becomes Polychrome (X1.5 Mult) and free
tags.effect_zh: 下一個在商店找到的基礎版本小丑牌變成幻彩版（X1.5 倍率）且免費

tags.effect_en: Gain $25 after defeating the next Boss Blind
tags.effect_zh: 擊敗下一個 Boss 盲注後獲得 $25

tags.effect_en: Adds a Voucher to the next Shop
tags.effect_zh: 在下一個商店添加一張增益券

tags.effect_en: Re-rolls the next Boss Blind
tags.effect_zh: 重擲下一個 Boss 盲注

tags.effect_en: Immediately open a free Mega Standard Pack
tags.effect_zh: 立即打開免費的超級標準卡包

tags.effect_en: Immediately open a free Mega Arcana Pack
tags.effect_zh: 立即打開免費的超級奧秘卡包

tags.effect_en: Immediately open a free Mega Celestial Pack
tags.effect_zh: 立即打開免費的超級天外卡包

tags.effect_en: Immediately open a free Mega Buffoon Pack
tags.effect_zh: 立即打開免費的超級丑角卡包

tags.effect_en: Gain $1 for each hand played this run
tags.effect_zh: 本局每出過一手牌獲得 $1

tags.effect_en: Gain $1 for each unused discard this run
tags.effect_zh: 本局每未使用的棄牌次數獲得 $1

tags.effect_en: Immediately open a free Spectral Pack
tags.effect_zh: 立即打開免費的幻靈卡包
tags.notes: Only pack tag that doesn't give a Mega Pack

tags.effect_en: In the next shop, initial Jokers, Consumables and Booster Packs are free ($0)
tags.effect_zh: 下一個商店中，初始小丑牌、消耗品和卡包免費（$0）

tags.effect_en: Gives a copy of the next Tag selected (excluding Double Tags)
tags.effect_zh: 複製下一個選擇的標籤（雙倍標籤除外）

tags.effect_en: +3 Hand Size for the next round only
tags.effect_zh: 僅下一回合 +3 手牌上限

tags.effect_en: In the next Shop, Rerolls start at $0
tags.effect_zh: 下一個商店，重擲起始價格為 $0

tags.effect_en: Create up to 2 Common Jokers (if you have space)
tags.effect_zh: 創造最多 2 張普通小丑牌（如果有空位）

tags.effect_en: Gives $5 for each Blind you've skipped this run
tags.effect_zh: 本局每跳過一個盲注獲得 $5

tags.effect_en: Upgrades a specified random Poker Hand by three levels
tags.effect_zh: 將指定的隨機牌型升級 3 級

tags.effect_en: Doubles your money (adds a maximum of $40)
tags.effect_zh: 金錢翻倍（最多增加 $40）

notes: Tags are received when skipping Small or Big Blind
Each Tag has equal chance to appear
Same Tag can appear multiple times in a run
9 Tags are restricted to Ante 2+: Negative, Standard, Meteor, Buffoon, Handy, Garbage, Ethereal, Top-up, Orbital
Edition Tags require discovering the respective edition first
Diet Cola Joker and Anaglyph Deck can also create Double Tags
